Even if you turn off Nod32 to install the minute you turn it on again it wants to delete the hmsc.exe file and it automatically quarantines the  hmsc_skr.dll	a variant of Win32/Packed.VMProtect.AAA trojan. Some anti viruses will delete/quarantine these without the user knowing and that's why the crack won't work

ESET NOD32 Goes Berserk Deleting all of the crack and crack fix contents , and It is going crazy over HMSC.exe being a virus 
I added it to Exclusion list and re-installing the game atm

INSTALL NOTES

1. Mount or burn image
2. Install
3. Download and Install Steam if you don't have it.
4. Download "Hitman.Sniper.Challenge.Fix-SKIDROW" by scene4all
5 .Copy everything from the SKIDROW folder into the game installation
6. Now good luck with the game !
7. Before launching the game, make sure that your firewall block all access to internet for the application.
